explainability.path_to_improvement: Document how explanations are provided to users affected by AI decisions.

external_accountability.path_to_improvement: Obtain external validation of AI practices or require vendor certifications.

fairness.path_to_improvement: Document bias testing procedures or vendor AI fairness requirements.

governance.findings: A technical paper describes a hybrid intelligence model that balances deterministic RPA bots with generative AI agents, and mentions a governance approach where employees identify friction points and executives measure ROI. Additionally, a press release highlights the strategic aim of co-developing an AI-powered procurement system, indicating governance through collaborative development.
governance.path_to_improvement: Document AI governance structure, including oversight of vendor AI tools.

relevant_sources.summary: This technical paper, "UiPath Fusion 25 – How Wesco Scaled Enterprise Automation with AI Orchestration," provides evidence for the **governance** pillar. The document describes Wesco's hybrid intelligence model, which balances deterministic RPA bots with generative AI agents, and mentions a governance approach where employees identify friction points and executives measure ROI, implying mechanisms for oversight and control.
relevant_sources.title: UiPath Fusion 25 – How Wesco Scaled Enterprise Automation with AI Orchestration

relevant_sources.summary: This press release provides evidence for the **governance** and **transparency** pillars of responsible AI. It highlights the strategic aim of co-developing an AI-powered procurement system, indicating governance through collaborative development. Furthermore, the announcement's emphasis on applying "AI" to streamline processes and embedding "AI-driven tools" demonstrates transparency in the intended application of AI.
relevant_sources.title: Wesco Invests $10M in Kojo to Build AI Procurement Tools for Construction

oversight.path_to_improvement: Document human review processes for AI-assisted decisions (built or vendor AI).

privacy.path_to_improvement: Document data protection practices for AI systems, including vendor AI data handling.

transparency.findings: Press releases describe the intended application of AI to streamline processes, embed AI-driven tools, and automate construction workflows. Documentation also describes the intended use of an AI platform to address customer pain points and outlines the AI tool and its application.
transparency.path_to_improvement: Document AI systems in use, including vendor/third-party AI tools.

relevant_sources.summary: This press release provides evidence for the **governance** and **transparency** pillars of responsible AI. It highlights the strategic aim of co-developing an AI-powered procurement system, indicating governance through collaborative development. Furthermore, the announcement's emphasis on applying "AI" to streamline processes and embedding "AI-driven tools" demonstrates transparency in the intended application of AI.
relevant_sources.title: Wesco Invests $10M in Kojo to Build AI Procurement Tools for Construction

relevant_sources.summary: This press release provides evidence for the **transparency** pillar of responsible AI. It describes the intended use of an AI platform to automate construction workflows and address customer pain points, aligning with transparency by documenting an AI tool and its application. However, the evidence suggests this documentation focuses on aspirations rather than concrete implementation details.
relevant_sources.title: Kojo Secures $10 Million Investment from Wesco Expanding Construction Tech Platform

summary.overall_findings: WESCO International's public documentation was reviewed across 7 responsible AI pillars, and no qualifying evidence was identified. While the assessment reviewed 6 publicly available sources, no documented AI governance, oversight, or accountability practices were found.
